document_data.mainbody: The Swords Aflame were an adventuring party in the late 9 century DR. Taline Telgara joined them at a Magefair they numbered at least two more wizards at the time. While she was with them, the Swords Aflame breached a number of dungeons looking for old magic at one point, they came to have no less than forty spellbooks to study. The party split because of growing rivalries and disastrous expeditions prior to the year .
